channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Storable Configs Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Storable Configs Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-30972|2024-08-03T07:03:40.143Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20storable%20configs%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Storable Configs Plugin 1.0 and earlier allows attackers to have Jenkins parse a local XML file (e.g., archived artifacts) that uses external entities for extraction of secrets from the Jenkins controller or server-side request forgery.

item.title: CVE-2022-30971|2024-08-03T07:03:40.213Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20storable%20configs%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Storable Configs Plugin 1.0 and earlier does not configure its XML parser to prevent XML external entity (XXE) attacks.
